definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="-830" y="-99"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">particles</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_category"><field name="name">lightattack</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakeffect</field><field name="comment">The efkefc file with the particle inside</field><value name="value"><block type="config_text_variable"><field name="name">effect</field><field name="value">lightattak</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakynudge</field><field name="comment">How much to move the particle downward</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">yNudge</field><field name="value">0.1</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakfwnudge</field><field name="comment">How much to move the particle forward</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">fwNudge</field><field name="value">1</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakscale</field><field name="comment">The scale of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Scale</field><field name="value">0.5</field></block></value><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">rotation</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakyaw</field><field name="comment">Yaw adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">yaw</field><field name="value">-90</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakpitch</field><field name="comment">Pitch adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">pitch</field><field name="value">0</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightattakroll</field><field name="comment">Roll adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">roll</field><field name="value">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">lightning</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningeffect</field><field name="comment">The efkefc file with the particle inside</field><value name="value"><block type="config_text_variable"><field name="name">effect</field><field name="value">lightning</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningynudge</field><field name="comment">How much to move the particle downward</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">yNudge</field><field name="value">0.1</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningfwnudge</field><field name="comment">How much to move the particle forward</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">fwNudge</field><field name="value">1</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningscale</field><field name="comment">The scale of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Scale</field><field name="value">0.5</field></block></value><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">rotation</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningyaw</field><field name="comment">Yaw adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">yaw</field><field name="value">-90</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningpitch</field><field name="comment">Pitch adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">pitch</field><field name="value">0</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lightningroll</field><field name="comment">Roll adjustement of the particle</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">roll</field><field name="value">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
